column4: Okay I'm having a problem with Audacity and Flash.  When one is using the sound card the other can't.  e.g. if I bring Audacity up, then Flash can't play sound.  If I bring Flash up, then Audacity can't open the driver.
yes, this is correct. Caused by them both using the old style sound drier (which exclusively locks the sound device)
The fix is to not use both at the same time.
but I need to use both.  Is there an update for either?  would the Flash 9 beta work?
I doubt it, but you can try...
is there another recorder in Ubuntu that can record from the mixer like Audacity can?
Oh, you're trying to record from flash?
um, Sound Recorder?  I see nothing to the likes of that in the Multimedia menu.
Ahhh okay.  I will go apt-get it :)
sound-recorder - Direct-to-disk recording and play-back programs.
